channel.name: PcStatus
channel.comment: Payload computer status. 0x00 - Good Picture overflow - 9 ID bits indicate picture index 0x10 - 75% full 0x11 - 85% full 0x12 - 90% full 0x13 - 95% full Memory overflow - 512 kB of memory 0x24 - 75% full 0x25 - 85% full 0x26 - 90% full 0x27 - 95% full Payload Status 0xF0000000 - Temp Sensor Error State 0x0F000000 - CRP Error State 0x00F00000 - MDE Error State 0x000F0000 - Payload Computer Error State Mode - What mode the PcMgr is in, hopefully the same as system mode 0x80 - Normal mode 0xC0 - Safe mode 0x40 - Detumble mode

channel.name: CrpDataCollected
channel.comment: Number of data points received by CRP

channel.name: MdeDataCollected
channel.comment: Number of data points received by MDE
